config.placeholder: The passed-in arguments will be used

config.text: Replace file with same name at destination

script:
use framework "Foundation"

on envVar(varName)
  (current application's NSProcessInfo's processInfo's environment's objectForKey:varName) as string
end envVar

on run argv
  set overwrite to envVar("overwrite") is "1"
  set posixTarget to envVar("save_in")
  set targetDir to (POSIX file posixTarget)
  set sourcePaths to {}

  -- Create destination directory
  tell current application's NSFileManager's defaultManager to createDirectoryAtPath:posixTarget withIntermediateDirectories:true attributes:(missing value) |error|:(missing value)

  repeat with itemNumber from 1 to count of argv
    try
      set pathString to item itemNumber of argv
      copy POSIX file pathString to the end of sourcePaths
    end try
  end repeat

  if overwrite then
    tell application "Finder" to duplicate sourcePaths to folder targetDir with replacing
  else
    tell application "Finder" to duplicate sourcePaths to folder targetDir
  end if
end run
